response.overview: A moving documentary about women for whom prison has become a second home. Each of the women staying there is a separate story - usually long and complicated. All dream of freedom, men and a new life. But for now, this cell is their whole world. They watch the courtyard from behind bars and exchange stories about what was, what is and what will be. Freedom is the theme - they dream about it, but also feel fear it. Afraid to return to reality, the reaction of the family, friends, exchanging the world for the prison walls.
response.title: Judgement Of Life
